word_mean: 烃，碳氢化合物：仅含碳和氢的有机化合物。按其原子排列和化学特征，可分为脂环族的 (alicyclic)、脂肪族的(aliphatic)和芳香族的(aromatic)

sentence.Network_en: During incomplete combustion some of the hydrocarbon fuel is cracked.

sentence.Network_en: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentence.Network_cn: 某碳氢化合物已知可能是烯烃或是烷烃.

sentence.Network_en: The benzenoid hydrocarbon are all nonclassical and, thus potentially aromatic.
sentence.Network_cn: 苯环型烃都是非经典烃, 因此,可能是芳香烃.

甲烷在全部烃类（碳氢，hydrocarbons）燃料中具有最少的碳和最高的氢碳比。它是最理想的未来燃料来实现向氢能经济的转变。

entry.def: A hydrocarbon is a chemical compound that is a mixture of hydrogen and carbon.

means.word_mean: 1. an organic compound containing only carbon and hydrogen
